00024 #ifndef _MSDATACACHE_HPP_
00025 #define _MSDATACACHE_HPP_
00026 
00027 
00028 #include "MSDataAnalyzer.hpp"
00029 #include "SpectrumInfo.hpp"
00030 
00031 
00032 namespace pwiz {
00033 namespace analysis {
00034 
00035 
00036 using namespace msdata;
00037 
00038 
00039 ///
00040 /// simple memory cache for common MSData info
00041 ///
00042 /// Memory caching is useful to minimize data retrieval expenses:
00043 /// - disk I/O and decoding of binary data
00044 /// - indirection and pointer validation
00045 /// - parameter list searching
00046 /// - lexical casting
00047 ///
00048 /// MSDataCache is a vector of SpectrumInfo objects, but also implements the
00049 /// MSDataAnalyzer interface.  It is *not* a lazy evaluator; it must be updated 
00050 /// from the outside.
00051 ///
00052 /// On update(), Spectrum binary data (SpectrumInfo::data) is
00053 /// freed from the cache using a LRU (least recently used) algorithm.
00054 /// Binary data will be freed only to make room for a new update.  The
00055 /// default cache size is 1, i.e. only the most recently updated binary 
00056 /// data array is stored.  Note that modifying the SpectrumInfo objects
00057 /// directly through the vector interface circumvents the LRU mechanism. 
00058 ///
00059 /// Intended usage:  MSDataCache should be placed first in an 
00060 /// MSDataAnalyzerContainer, so that it receives update() first.  Other 
00061 /// analyzers may then use it (preferably as const MSDataCache&) to access 
00062 /// spectrum data when they receive update().  On updateRequested(),
00063 /// MSDataCache returns UpdateRequest_Ok to indicate that it should
00064 /// receive any updates that are requested by other analyzers.  If no 
00065 /// other analyzer requests an update, the cache will not be updated.
00066 ///
00067 class MSDataCache : public std::vector<SpectrumInfo>,
00068                     public MSDataAnalyzer
00069                     
00070 {
00071     public:
00072 
00073     /// MSDataCache configuration
00074     struct Config
00075     {
00076         size_t binaryDataCacheSize;
00077         Config() : binaryDataCacheSize(1) {}
00078     };
00079 
00080     MSDataCache(const Config& config = Config());
00081 
00082     /// \name MSDataAnalyzer interface 
00083     //@{
00084     virtual void open(const DataInfo& dataInfo);
00085 
00086     virtual UpdateRequest updateRequested(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00087                                           const SpectrumIdentity& spectrumIdentity) const
00088     { 
00089         // receive update() only if requested by another analyzer 
00090         return MSDataAnalyzer::UpdateRequest_Ok;
00091     }
00092 
00093     virtual void update(const DataInfo& dataInfo, 
00094                         const Spectrum& spectrum);
00095     //@}
00096 
00097     private:
00098     struct Impl;
00099     boost::shared_ptr<Impl> impl_;
00100     MSDataCache(MSDataCache&);
00101     MSDataCache& operator=(MSDataCache&);
00102 };
00103 
00104 
00105 } // namespace analysis 
00106 } // namespace pwiz
00107 
00108 
00109 #endif // _MSDATACACHE_HPP_
